trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 已完成處理的執行個體內容。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 表示在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> 物件完成處理時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback>，即可通知 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 執行階段有個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 物件已完成處理。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, WCF calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback>物件通知執行階段，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback>已完成其工作，WCF 會呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>一次一次。

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: 這個循環會一直持續，直到 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 傳回 `true` 而該內容已關閉並回收為止。
